languages.text: {n}Инквизитор коротко кланяется Ульфару.{/n} "Вам, господин, я также советую отправиться на Ефрат-II. Быть может, ваша стая была более откровенна с почтенным Торбальдом, чем со мной, и сообщила ему, куда решила направить свои стопы".

{n}The Inquisitor bows to Ulfar curtly.{/n} "I recommend that you, too, go to Eufrates II, my lord. Perhaps your pack was less reticent with the esteemed Thorbald than with me, and told him where they decided to direct their efforts."
languages.original_text: {n}Инквизитор коротко кланяется Ульфару.{/n} "Вам, господин, я также советую отправиться на Ефрат-II. Быть может, ваша стая была более откровенна с почтенным Торбальдом, чем со мной, и сообщила ему, куда решила направить свои стопы".

traits.locale_text: {n}The Inquisitor bows to Ulfar curtly.{/n} "I recommend that you, too, go to Eufrates II, sir. Perhaps your pack was less reticent with the esteemed Thorbald than with me, and told him where they'd decided to direct their efforts."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

traits.locale_text: {n}The Inquisitor bows to Ulfar curtly.{/n} "I recommend that you, too, go to Eufrates II, my lord. Perhaps your pack was less reticent with the esteemed Thorbald than with me, and told him where they decided to direct their efforts."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

traits.locale_text: {n}The Inquisitor bows to Ulfar curtly.{/n} "I recommend that you, too, go to Eufrates II, my lord. Perhaps your pack was less reticent with the esteemed Thorbald than with me, and told him where they decided to direct their efforts."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: {n}大审判官简短地朝乌尔法鞠了一躬。{/n}“我也同样建议你去欧夫拉茨二号星，大人。虽然你的狼群没有向我透露任何事情，但或许他们对索巴德说了些什么，告知了他们接下来打算去的地方。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Inquisitor bows to Ulfar curtly.{/n} "I recommend that you, too, go to Eufrates II, my lord. Perhaps your pack was less reticent with the esteemed Thorbald than with me, and told him where they decided to direct their efforts."

traits.locale_text: {n}审判长简短地朝乌尔法鞠了一躬。{/n}“我也同样建议你去欧夫拉茨二号星，大人。虽然你的狼群没有向我透露任何事情，但或许他们对索巴德说了些什么，告知了他们接下来打算去的地方。”
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: {n}異端審問官はウルファーにそっけなく頭を下げる。{/n}「あなたもユーフラテス・IIの元に行くべきです。あなたの群れは、私よりずっと尊敬するトールバルドに対してなら、口を割ったかもしれない。彼にたいしては、自分たちの努力の方向性を教えたかもしれない」
languages.original_text: {n}The Inquisitor bows to Ulfar curtly.{/n} "I recommend that you, too, go to Eufrates II, my lord. Perhaps your pack was less reticent with the esteemed Thorbald than with me, and told him where they decided to direct their efforts."

traits.locale_text: {n}異端審問官はウルファーにそっけなく頭を下げる。{/n}「あなたもユーフラテス・IIの元に行くべきです。あなたの群れは、私よりずっと尊敬するトールバルドに対してなら、口を割ったかもしれない。彼にたいしては、自分たちの努力の方向性を教えたかもしれない」
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: {n}El Inquisidor se inclina ante Ulfar.{/n} «Le recomiendo que también vaya a Eufrates II, milord. Quizás su jauría fuera menos reticente con Thorbald que conmigo y le dijera hacia dónde habían decidido dirigir sus esfuerzos».
languages.original_text: {n}The Inquisitor bows to Ulfar curtly.{/n} "I recommend that you, too, go to Eufrates II, my lord. Perhaps your pack was less reticent with the esteemed Thorbald than with me, and told him where they decided to direct their efforts."

traits.locale_text: {n}El Inquisidor se inclina ante Ulfar.{/n} «Le recomiendo que también vaya a Eufrates II, señor. Quizás su jauría fuera menos reticente con Thorbald que conmigo y le dijera hacia dónde habían decidido dirigir sus esfuerzos».
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: {n}Der Inquisitor verneigt sich knapp vor Ulfar.{/n} "Ich empfehle, dass auch Ihr nach Eufrates II reist, Herr. Vielleicht war Euer Rudel dem verehrten Thorbald gegenüber weniger schweigsam und hat ihm gesagt, wo es tätig werden wollte."
languages.original_text: {n}The Inquisitor bows to Ulfar curtly.{/n} "I recommend that you, too, go to Eufrates II, my lord. Perhaps your pack was less reticent with the esteemed Thorbald than with me, and told him where they decided to direct their efforts."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Inquisitor verneigt sich knapp vor Ulfar.{/n} "Ich empfehle, dass auch Ihr nach Eufrates II reist, Sir. Vielleicht war Euer Rudel dem verehrten Thorbald gegenüber weniger schweigsam und hat ihm gesagt, wo es tätig werden wollte."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: {n}L'inquisiteur s'incline brièvement en direction d'Ulfar.{/n} « Je vous recommande d'aller vous aussi sur Euphrate-II, mon seigneur. Qui sait, votre meute s'est peut-être montrée moins réticente avec l'honorable Thorbald ; il se pourrait qu'il sache où elle s'est rendue. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Inquisitor bows to Ulfar curtly.{/n} "I recommend that you, too, go to Eufrates II, my lord. Perhaps your pack was less reticent with the esteemed Thorbald than with me, and told him where they decided to direct their efforts."

traits.locale_text: {n}L'inquisiteur s'incline brièvement en direction d'Ulfar.{/n} « Je vous recommande d'aller vous aussi sur Euphrate-II, mon seigneur. Qui sait, votre meute s'est peut-être montrée moins réticente avec l'honorable Thorbald ; il se pourrait qu'il sache où elle s'est rendue. »
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: {n}Engizisyoncu, Ulfar'ın önünde saygıyla eğiliyor.{/n} "Lordum, senin de Eufrates II'ye gitmeni öneririm. Sürün, muhterem Thorbald'la benden daha çok konuşmuştur belki. Gayretlerini ne tarafa yönelttiklerini ona söylemiş olabilirler."
languages.original_text: {n}The Inquisitor bows to Ulfar curtly.{/n} "I recommend that you, too, go to Eufrates II, my lord. Perhaps your pack was less reticent with the esteemed Thorbald than with me, and told him where they decided to direct their efforts."
